channel.title: Announcements on ProgTeam@NYU
channel.description: Recent content in Announcements on ProgTeam@NYU

item.title: Winter Practice
item.description: Hi everyone, Hope everyone’s final season went well! We’ll be holding our first practice session for the ICPC online soon. We’re planning on having a 5-hour session about every 10 days, and our first practice contest will be at 2:00pm EST this Wednesday the 28th.

item.title: Welcome to ProgTeam!
item.description: Hi everyone, The progteam is back! We will be hosting 1-2 hour sessions on Fridays at 5pm at 102 CIWW. If youâ€™re interested in competitive programming, learning advanced algorithms, preparing for tech interviews, or simply enjoy chatting with peers also interested in programming, please join our new Discord server https://discord.com/invite/SFeawGptjJ and join our sessions on Fridays!
